t: Psalm 118
His Steadfast Love Endures Forever
Oh*pn give thanks to the Lord,*s for he is good; for*ld his steadfast love endures forever!
Let*pn Israel say, “His*ld steadfast love endures forever.”
Let*ln the house of Aaron say, “His*ld steadfast love endures forever.”
Let*ln those who fear the Lord*s say, “His*ld steadfast love endures forever.”
Out*pn of my distress I called on the Lord;*s the*ld Lord*s answered me and set me free.
The*ln Lord*s is on my side; I will not fear. What*ld can man do to me?
The*ln Lord*s is on my side as my helper; I*ld shall look in triumph on those who hate me.
It*pn is better to take refuge in the Lord*s than*ld to trust in man.
It*ln is better to take refuge in the Lord*s than*ld to trust in princes.
All*pn nations surrounded me; in*ld the name of the Lord*s I cut them off!
They*ln surrounded me, surrounded me on every side; in*ld the name of the Lord*s I cut them off!
They*ln surrounded me like bees; they*ld went out like a fire among thorns; in*ld the name of the Lord*s I cut them off!
I*ln was pushed hard, so that I was falling, but*ld the Lord*s helped me.
The*pn Lord*s is my strength and my song; he*ld has become my salvation.
Glad*ln songs of salvation are*ld in the tents of the righteous: “The*ln right hand of the Lord*s does valiantly,
the*ld right hand of the Lord*s exalts, the*ld right hand of the Lord*s does valiantly!”
I*pn shall not die, but I shall live, and*ld recount the deeds of the Lord.*s
The*ln Lord*s has disciplined me severely, but*ld he has not given me over to death.
Open*pn to me the gates of righteousness, that*ld I may enter through them and*ld give thanks to the Lord.*s
This*ln is the gate of the Lord;*s the*ld righteous shall enter through it.
I*ln thank you that you have answered me and*ld have become my salvation.
The*ln stone that the builders rejected has*ld become the cornerstone.
This*ln is the Lord’s*s doing; it*ld is marvelous in our eyes.
This*ln is the day that the Lord*s has made; let*ld us rejoice and be glad in it.
Save*pn us, we pray, O Lord!*s O*ld Lord,*s we pray, give us success!
Blessed*pn is he who comes in the name of the Lord!*s We*ld bless you from the house of the Lord.*s
The*ln Lord*s is God, and*ld he has made his light to shine upon us. Bind*ln the festal sacrifice with cords, up*ld to the horns of the altar!
You*pn are my God, and I will give thanks to you; you*ld are my God; I will extol you.
Oh*ln give thanks to the Lord,*s for he is good; for*ld his steadfast love endures forever!
